welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bull Mountain, a charming city known for its natural beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Portland Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, American Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves international flights for Air Canada, Condor, and Icelandair.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves domestic flights within Papua New Guinea.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mal Airport handles the transportation of goods and supplies to and from the region.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at McNary Field Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at McNary Field Airport is used for private and charter flights, as well as flight training and other aviation services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
